#summary Bayeux response codes
= Introduction =

List of Bayeux error/response codes.  Includes constant, closest matching HTTP response code, and response text.  


= Details =

The error field will take the form of 

CONSTANT(CODE): MESSAGE
ex: RC_INVALID_CHANNEL(405): The meta channel specified is not valid.

|| *code* || *constant* || *message* ||
||200||RC_SUCCESS||blahblah||
||blah||blahblah||blahblah||
||blah||blahblah||blahblah||
